h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: This boss is also fond of teleporting to distract you as well, rapidly appearing behind or to the side of you before throwing his chakram at you to keep you guessing.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
This boss is also fond of teleporting to distract you as well, rapidly appearing behind or to the side of you before throwing his chakram at you to keep you guessing.
